headline: The Template for Judging a President
abstract: Twenty-one years ago, President Bill Clinton was brought up on charges of high crimes and misdemeanors. But there were some big differences from what President Trump now faces.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON â€” The senator was livid. The president of his own party had gotten himself in so much trouble that he was now facing impeachment. And so when the phone rang one night after dinner and the senator picked up to find the White House on the line, he cursed the commander in chief.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
